item.description: Skupina Gorenje je z reprezentativnimi sindikati hčerinske družbe Asko na Švedskem zaključila prvo fazo pogajanj o različnih možnostih optimizacije in prestrukturiranja omenjene družbe.

item.title: V Galeriji Velenje na ogled razstava o Gorenjevem oblikovanju
item.description: Od 18. junija do 22. septembra 2012 je v Galeriji Velenje na ogled razstava o razvoju vrhunskega oblikovanja v Gorenju. Razstava »Gorenje z vizijo« je nastala v sodelovanju med Gorenjem in Galerijo Velenje in je del mrežnega projekta »Uf, industrija« zavoda Maribor 2012 – Evropska prestolnica kulture.

item.title: Organizirano zbiranje pooblastil za uresničevanje glasovalnih pravic delničarjev
item.description: Družba Gorenje, d.d., že vsa leta spodbuja delničarje k aktivnemu izvrševanju njihovih pravic z organiziranim zbiranjem pooblastil in v skladu s priporočili kodeksa o upravljanju javnih delniških družb objavlja, da so z današnjim dnem pooblaščenci za zbiranje pooblastil začeli z zbiranjem pooblastil za uresničevanje glasovalnih parvic delničerjev na 18. skupščini delničarjev Gorenje, d.d., ki je sklicana za 5.7.2012.

item.title: Nasprotni predlog sklepov skupščine
item.description: Uprava družbe Gorenje, d.d. je prejela nasprotni predlog delničarja Društvo Mali delničarji Slovenije k točki 4. dnevnega reda »Imenovanje revizorja«.

item.title: Objava sklica 18. skupščine delničarjev družbe Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: Na podlagi veljavne zakonodaje uprava družbe sklicuje 18. sejo skupščine delničarjev družbe, ki bo v četrtek, 5. julija 2012, z začetkom ob 13.00 uri, v veliki dvorani hotela Paka v Velenju, Rudarska ul. 1.

item.title: Gorenje obeležilo 20 let uspešnega delovanja managerske akademije
item.description: Gorenje je 30. maja s svečanim dogodkom obeležilo 20. obletnico Managerske akademije Gorenja. Po zgledu najboljših mednarodnih korporacij pa v prihodnosti načrtujejo vzpostavitev t.i. Korporativne univerze Gorenja, ki bo poleg managerske akademije vključevala še izobraževalna programa za mednarodni in vrhnji management.

item.title: Gorenje v prvem četrtletju z nižjimi prihodki, a višjim dobičkom kot lani
item.description: Skupina Gorenje je v prvem četrtletju letošnjega leta ustvarila 299,1 milijona evrov prihodkov od prodaje, kar je nekoliko manj kot načrtovano. Glavni razlog za to so zaostrene gospodarske razmere v Evropi, v primerjavi s prvim četrtletjem lani pa so prihodki manjši tudi zaradi odprodaje družbe Istrabenz Gorenje. Navkljub manjši prodaji je dobiček podjetja vseeno višji od lanskoletnega in tudi načrtovanega.

item.title: Gorenje s srbsko vlado sklenilo pogodbo o širitvi investicije v Valjevu
item.description: Gorenje je 26. aprila 2012 s srbsko vlado sklenilo pogodbo o širitvi proizvodnih kapacitet hladilno-zamrzovalnih aparatov v Valjevu. Srbija bo Gorenju za razširitev obstoječe tovarne v Valjevu in otvoritev 400 novih delovnih mest do konca leta 2015 zagotovila nepovratna sredstva v višini 10.000 evrov.

item.title: Nadzorni svet Gorenja sprejel letno poročilo za 2011 in imenoval novega člana uprave za finance
item.description: Nadzorni svet družbe Gorenje, d.d., je na današnji seji sprejel letno poročilo matične družbe Gorenje, d.d., in konsolidirano letno poročilo Skupine Gorenje za leto 2011 ter ocenil, da je bilo poslovanje Gorenja glede na zahtevne pogoje poslovanja dobro.

item.title: Skupina Gorenje nadaljuje z optimizacijo proizvodnih lokacij
item.description: Skladno s strateškim načrtom za obdobje 2012-2015 Skupina Gorenje intenzivno nadaljuje z optimiranjem proizvodnih lokacij, s čimer povečuje svojo konkurenčnost v panogi gospodinjskih aparatov in krepi dobičkonosnost poslovanja.

item.title: Gorenje tudi letos v družbi najboljših na področju oblikovanja
item.description: Gorenje se je tudi letos na mednarodnem natečaju red dot za najbolje oblikovane izdelke uvrstilo med prejemnike nagrad.

item.title: Lansko leto še zahtevnejše od leta 2010
item.description: Lansko leto je bilo za panogo gospodinjskih aparatov še zahtevnejše od leta 2010. Obseg in struktura prodaje ter dobičkonosnost poslovanja so bili pod pritiskom visokih cen surovin in materiala ter valutnih in plačilnih tveganj pri oslabljenem povpraševanju potrošnikov.

item.title: Another successful appearance for Gorenje at the IFA tradeshow in Berlin
item.description: Gorenje is pleased with its seventh appearance at the IFA tradeshow, the largest international event dedicated to consumer electronics and home appliances. The company finds the turnover at their exhibition area successful as they were visited by many business partners and customers from across the world.

item.title: Gorenje on WETEX fair in Dubai
item.description: The 16th Water, Energy, Technology & Environment Exhibition (WETEX) 2014 was held at the Za'abeel Halls, spanning on the area of 47.000 sq. in Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Centre, from April 14th to 16th, 2014. Gorenje Gulf FZE participated as exhibitor in cooperation with their exclusive distributor for UAE market – Jumbo Electronics Group.

item.title: ASKO Pro Series™ range lanchued at design week in Milan
item.description: The ASKO Pro Series™ was launched as a full range of exclusive kitchen products at the Tortona design week in Milan, which took place last week from April 8th – 13th, 2014. The range is inspired by the heritage and tonality of the ASKO brand – Professional and Stainless Steel.

item.title: Gorenje entered into European project ResCoM
item.description: Gorenje entered into European project ResCoM - Resource Conservative Manufacturing - transforming waste into high value resource through closed-loop product systems. This project has received funding from the European Union’s Seventh Programme for research, technological development and demonstration under grant agreement No 603843.

item.title: Gorenje portable induction hob in Sochi
item.description: During the Winter Olympic games in Sochi Gorenje provided a portable induction hob to the team aMAZE for preparing hot and delicious home made culinary delights. Hot! Cool! Yours!

item.title: Bravo Peter Prevc! Bravo Vesna Fabjan! Congratulations for Olympic medals!
item.description: Gorenje - proud supporter of Slovenian athletes - shares the joy and happiness of winning eight Olympic medals with the whole Slovenia. As the general sponsor of Slovenian Nordic teams Gorenje congratulates to Peter Prevc for silver and bronze medal and to Vesna Fabjan for bronze medal.

item.title: Superbrand for Kuchyne Gorenje in the Czech Republic
item.description: Kuchyne Gorenje (Gorenje Kitchens) brand received the prestigious Superbrand 2014 award and thereby officially joined the elite club of excellent brands in the Czech Republic where Gorenje has a long standing tradition of kitchen furniture sales, in addition to marketing Mora and Gorenje brand home appliances.

item.title: Gorenje Orodjarna expands its operations in Serbia
item.description: Gorenje Orodjarna, d.o.o., a Gorenje subsidiary manufacturing industrial tools for metal and plastics processing for the automotive and major appliance industry, is expanding its operations in Serbia. To this end, they founded their first international subsidiary Gorenje MDM, d.o.o., in Kragujevac, Serbia.

item.title: International agreement signed with Expert International
item.description: On January 23, Gorenje Group and Expert International signed an international supply agreement that confirms the intent of the two partners to step up their cooperation in sale of Gorenje appliances through Expert's international network of specialized stores.

item.title: Behind the scenes - making of video Air Force Slovenia
item.description: Alongside the shooting of the video Air Force Slovenia II: Type: Ski Jumper; Model: Winner; Made by: Gorenje, at Gorenje's fridge-freezer and dishwasher plant in Velenje before the New Year's Four Hills Tournament, on December 18, 2013, a behind the scenes video was also made.

item.title: From Gorenje's manufacturing plant - video Air Force Slovenia
item.description: Working with the Ski Association of Slovenia, Gorenje - the general sponsor of Slovenian Nordic Ski Teams - supported the promotion of the Ski Jumping World Cup event in Planica by participating in the making of the video Air Force Slovenia II, which carries the message of how Gorenje crafts the ski jumping winners.

item.title: Second place for photography in internal media of European enterprises and organizations
item.description: On Thursday, November 28, 2013 the Federation of European Business Communicators Associations FEIEA held the Grand Prix 2013 award ceremony for the best practice in internal communication. Gorenje was among the award recipients, coming in second in the category Best Photograph in Internal Publication.

item.title: New Simplicity Collection presented in Sarajevo
item.description: On November 24, 2013 Gorenje presented its new Gorenje Simplicity Collection to over 200 business partners and guests from Bosnia and Herzegovina. The new technologically advanced collection that memorizes the user habits and program choices was launched at an event featuring the popular singer Halid Bešlić.

item.title: IQcook cooking hob at the 15th Business Conference in Portorož
item.description: At the Business Conference that took place in Portorož on November 21 and 22, 2013, Gorenje presented their revolutionary innovation: the IQcook induction hob that uses sensor technology to completely change the way we cook.

item.title: After two successful seasons, our ski jumpers set high goals for the new one
item.description: On November 19, 2013, Gorenje hosted a press conference of Slovenian ski jumpers and Nordic combined contestants at Gorenje Slovenija premises in Ljubljana upon the launch of the new season. Gorenje has been a proud sponsor of the Slovenian Nordic ski teams for 21 years.

item.title: Gorenje has the best financial report for the year 2012
item.description: Gorenje has the best financial report in Slovenia for the fiscal year 2012 among all contest entries. Such was the decision of an expert jury evaluating the annual reports submitted for the best annual report contest. The contest was organized by the Finance daily paper for the 14th consecutive year.

item.title: Gorenje at Month of Design tenth anniversary
item.description: Gorenje again attended Month of Design this year. The SensoCare NGPS12 washing machine and the Aerogor heat pump are among this year's winners of the Design award 2013 and they were showcased as a part of the Design Expo exhibition. The Slovenian Design Highlights retrospective included Gorenje's legendary Simple&Logical washing machine which won the Timeless Award in 2011.

item.title: Gorenje retro refrigerators let their moustache grow and support Movember
item.description: Movember challenges all men to let the moustache stand throughout November. In this way, the Movember organization puts focus on prostate and testicular cancer and mental health. Gorenje wants to support this important cause with the donation of four custom made retro fridges.

item.title: Gorenje at the Energetika 2013 tradeshow in Belgrade
item.description: At the Energetika 2013 tradeshow in Belgrade, taking place from October 8 to 12, 2013 Gorenje presented to the Serbian market for the second year in a row their own solutions in the field of renewable energy resources and efficient use of energy.

item.title: Gorenje wins the 2013 ZEPS award for promotion
item.description: At the 20th International Tradeshow ZEPS 2013 in Zenica, Gorenje Solar, Gorenje Projekt, and Gorenje Indop introduced their own solutions in renewable energy resources and efficient use of energy to the market of Bosnia and Herzegovina. For the presentation at the fair, Gorenje received the tradeshow award for promotion.

item.title: Gorenje contributes to on-line charity auction in Denmark
item.description: Following the successful charity auctions in Moscow, London, Norway, Slovenia, and two in Croatia, Gorenje is joining a charity campaign Knæk Cancer in Denmark in order to raise funds to fight cancer by donating a unique retro fridge from the very popular Gorenje Retro Collection.

item.title: Slovenian contemporary design exhibited in Moscow
item.description: The exhibition Silent Revolutions is displayed at Moscow Design Week from 11 to 17 October 2013. The presentation is the seventh event in the series of international presentations of Slovenian design. Gorenje is presenting IQcook induction hob, HomeChef oven and SensoCare washing machine.

item.title: Gorenje Keramika at the ZEPS 2013 Tradeshow in Bosnia and Herzegovina
item.description: From October 1 to 5, company Gorenje Ceramics joined Gorenje Commerce company from Sarajevo in a presentation at the top business event in Bosnia and Herzegovina, the 20th International Tradeshow ZEPS 2013 in Zenica.

item.title: Gorenje Munich company at Küchenmeile@ MAZ 2013 fair
item.description: Gorenje's company in Germany was during 11th and 19th September 2013, present at the Küchenmeile@ MAZ 2013 fair in Löhne, where they exhibited on 350 m² exhibition area, which is otherwise Gorenje's constant exhibition installation at the MAZ, appliances of Gorenje, Gorenje+ and ATAG brands.

item.title: Opening of the fifth Gorenje Studio in Slovenia
item.description: Gorenje is expanding its own retail network in the Slovenian market. The fifth Gorenje Studio in Slovenia was opened recently in Murska Sobota, offering the entire range of Gorenje brand products.

item.title: Gorenje steam oven a highlight at the Thai Food Festival in Mumbai
item.description: A leading prestigious private club called “The Club”, located near the Indian metropolis Mumbai, hosted the Thai Food Festival. For nine days, the visitors enjoyed various tastes of Thai food and special evening entertainment – a live kitchen featuring the attention-grabbing Gorenje steam oven.

item.title: Mora brand at the Royal Castle Červený kameň
item.description: On September 12, 2013, a regional event was held at the Červený kameň castle near Bratislava, Slovak Republic, to present the Mora brand from history dating back to 1825, to the present, with product novelties and the entire portfolio of kitchen appliances.

item.title: New Gorenje Classico Collection at Prazdnik ‘Edi’ event in Moscow
item.description: On August 31, 2013 the third annual Prazdnik ‘Edi’ - Moscow's main culinary festival on the fresh air, was hosted at the Gorky Park. Gorenje presented the new design collection of kitchen appliances at this event - Gorenje Classico Collection. The main idea of this year’s festival was to explore and show the new global trends in street food.

item.title: Colour Your Home - Gorenje’s Campaign of the year in Germany
item.description: This year Gorenje in Germany brings colour(s) back into play. The 2012 campaign “Year of Colours” continues with a variation on the theme for 2013, “Colour Your Home”, again filled with colour and a big focus on design. With this campaign Gorenje is making Germany more colourful and helping build positive acceptance of the brand.

item.title: Gorenje at the Casa Cor event in Brazil
item.description: Casa Cor, one of the key events in architecture and interior design, will come to a close this week in São Paulo, a Brazilian metropolis of 11 million. Taking place from May 28 to July 21, 2013 it also involved an exhibition of Gorenje's selected designer appliances. Gorenje also opened its first own showroom in Brazil in March this year.

item.title: Gorenje received five red dot awards
item.description: At this year's red dot international contest, Gorenje Group won five prestigious red dot design awards 2013. The award went to outdoor unit of the Gorenje Aerogor heat pump, SensoCare NGPS12 new generation washing machine and three awards were won by cooking hobs of the Atag brand.

item.title: Gorenje wins the highest innovation award in the region
item.description: Gorenje earned another best innovation award this year, presented by the Slovenian Chamber of Commerce and Industry. At the regional contest, the IQcook induction hob and the new generation of washing machines and dryers won the golden award and the unit for co-generation Indop won the silver award.

item.title: ION Generation launched in Slovenain market
item.description: Company Gorenje Slovenia organised a launch of the new generation of refrigerators with special training seminar for their business partners and sales personnel to present some of the many advanced solutions featured in the ION Generation refrigerators.

item.title: Gorenje boosting its presence in the kitchen studio channel of the Mongolian market
item.description: Gorenje's business partner in Mongolia company Euro-Electronics LCC has recently expanded its offer to the higher end of the market by launching a kitchen studio featuring German furniture Häcker paired with high-end designer appliances Gorenje+.

item.title: Ciril Cesar's oeuvre at the Velenje Gallery
item.description: A retrospective commemorating the ninetieth birthday of the sculptor and designer Ciril Cesar opened on June 15, 2013 at the Velenje Gallery. Ciril Cesar took a notable step forward in the history of Gorenje's industrial design by introducing a systemic pattern ma-de-co (marketing–design–construction) which he implemented in 1970 when he joined Gorenje.

item.title: IQcook launched at the Mikser festival in Serbia
item.description: Gorenje premièred its revolutionary IQcook cooking hob in the Serbian market at the Mikser festival in Belgrade which took place from May 28 to June 2, 2013. This innovative hob employs sensor technology to completely change the way we cook.

item.title: Bolgarian ION Big event for busines partners
item.description: This past May Gorenje's company in Bulgaria impressed their business partners with ION Big event. Event was held in Valjevo, Serbia in the new Gorenje plant for fridge freezers. Main focus of the event was on the introduction of the new ION generation of refrigerators.

item.title: Plus X Award for Gorenje's global innovation IQcook
item.description: Following the prestigious red dot design award 2012, Gorenje's IQcook induction hob with top-notch IQ sensor technology won the Plus X Award for innovation and superior quality, and the best product of the year 2013 award in the category of home appliances.

item.title: Gorenje opens its fourth Gorenje Experience Center in India
item.description: Just under a year ago, Gorenje expanded its sales operations to the market of India, opening four sales studios since September 2012. After Mumbai, Chennai, and Bangalore, the fourth Gorenje Experience Center was opened in early May in the exclusive Lower Parel quarter in the center of Mumbai.

item.title: Gorenje handball players are 2012/13 national champions
item.description: On May 24 the final game of the Slovenian handball national championship was played at the Red Arena in Velenje. This is HC Gorenje Velenje's third national championship title, and the second in a row. The team only lost twice in the national championship this season and they clinched the title a game before the end. Gorenje proudly congratulates the 2012/13 national champions.

item.title: Gorenje voted the most trusted home appliance brand in Slovenia
item.description: The Reader's Digest magazine held a ceremony on May 22, 2013 to present the 2013 Trusted Brand awards to the brands enjoying the highest consumer confidence. Gorenje was voted the most trusted home appliance brand for the seventh year in a row.

item.title: Gorenje celebrates 60 years of toolmaking
item.description: The tradition of toolmaking at Gorenje dates back 60 years. Since the founding of the company Gorenje Orodjarna, d.o.o., in 1993, which celebrated its 20th anniversary on May 6, the scope of this activity has been greatly extended.

item.title: ION Generation Party in Prague
item.description: Gorenje ION generation launch event in Prague was created as party demonstrating the features of the new Gorenje fridge-freezers generation. The event, held in the consecrated chapel of Sacre Coeur in the centre of Prague at the end of april, was attended by more than 150 guests.

item.title: Irena Vodopivec receives the Slovenian HR Association Award
item.description: At the annual meeting of HR professionals on April 18, 2013, Planet GV and Slovenian HR Association presented the awards for excellence in human resource management. Irena Vodopivec, executive director of human resources and education at Gorenje, d.d. in Velenje, received the silver medal of the Slovenian HR association.

item.title: Gorenje enters the Malaysian market
item.description: Gorenje entered the kitchen studio channel in the Malaysian market in cooperation with its business partner Signature Kitchen. The futuristic Gorenje Ora-Ïto kitchen was a true eye magnet at Malaysian largest home equipment tradeshow the Perfect Livin' Exhibition 2013 which took place in early April the country's capital of Kuala Lumpur.

item.title: Gorenje Orodjarna wins three Forma Tool awards
item.description: Gorenje Orodjarna remained loyal to its tradition of participating in the international Forma Tool tradeshow. At this year's instalment which took place from April 16 to 19 at the Celje fairground, they presented two tools and one measuring device. They received awards for all three showcased products.

item.title: Gorenje teams up with the German ice hockey team Hamburg Freezers
item.description: Company Gorenje Munich signed a sponsorship deal with one of the top German hockey teams the Hamburg Freezers, for two games of the national play-offs taking place on March 22 and 30, 2013. Two Gorenje Retro refrigerators with the distinctive logo of this team were made for the occasion.

item.title: Planica the perfect venue for a glorious finish of the ski jumping season
item.description: After winning many medals in this season, Slovenian ski jumpers added four more in the final events of the World Cup before the home crowd at the Planica Hill this weekend, March 21 to 24, 2013. Gorenje proudly congratulates on these excellent results.

item.title: Exhibition Silent Revolutions in Vienna
item.description: After several successful international appearances, the exhibition of Slovenian design titled Silent Revolutions (MAO), which also features innovative and superiorly designed products by Gorenje (HomeCHEF, IQcook induction technology), will be set up in Vienna (MuseumsQuartier, Design Forum) from March 21 to April 28, 2013.

item.title: Ideas for new services come out on top in the 10th Gorenje Design Contest
item.description: On March 15, 2013 Gorenje held its 10th internal Gorenje Design Contest. The topic of the contest, Loving Simplicity, was design of home appliances, services, and solutions for the home, which allow simple and innovative user experience. The jury decided to present the award to two entries.

item.title: Gorenje’s first showroom in Brazil
item.description: Gorenje opened their first showroom in Brazil. It is located in the metropolis of Sao Paulo, in the popular Avenida Brasil. The showroom offers a choice of Gorenje appliances of the highest price range, including the prestigious designer lines by world-famous designers such as Karim Rashid, who was the guest of honour at the opening, Paolo Pininfarina, Ora-Ïto, and elegant Swarovski fridge-freezers.

item.title: Gorenje among the most trustworthy brands
item.description: For the seventh consecutive year, Gorenje brand is the recipient of the Trusted Brand award in the category of home appliances in Slovenia. As many as 69% of the readers of the Reader's Digest magazine, the institution awarding the Trusted Brand accolade, would choose Gorenje among the home appliances in Slovenia.

item.title: Excellent ratings for Gorenje's induction hob on the VIP test
item.description: At the independent international consumer benchmark test of induction hobs, Gorenje induction hob IS641AC scored an above-average rating of 4.3 and ranked among the products recommended by the Slovenian Consumers Association as a good buy.

item.title: Gorenje boosting its presence in the market of India
item.description: After entering the market of India in 2012 in a team-up with Enviro Appliances & Services, Gorenje opened its third Gorenje Experience Centre in this country on February, 28 2013. The two in Mumbai and Chennai, respectively, are now joined by another one in the south Indian metropolis of Bangalore.

item.title: Slovenian ski jumpers perennially featured on the podium
item.description: On February 9, 2013 Slovenian ski jumpers won the second gold in this season's team events ¬ this time in Willingen, Germany. On February 13, Jaka Hvala won the individual gold medal in the World Cup event in Klingenthal. On February 16, Peter Prevc climbed the podium as he won sliver in Oberstdorf. Gorenje congratulates for the medals.

item.title: Gorenje's initial corporate note offering a success
item.description: On October 10, 2014, Gorenje, d.d., successfully issued 5-year corporate notes with a total face value of EUR 73 million. The company initially planned the total issue of EUR 50 million; however, strong investor interest led it to increase the overall emission amount. The funds raised by the sale of notes will be used by Gorenje to improve the maturity profile of its debt and for partial deleveraging. This is Gorenje's first issue of bonds since its transformation into a public limited (joint stock) company.

item.title: Gorenje commences call for binding offers for 5-year notes
item.description: The company GORENJE, d.d., Partizanska cesta 12, SI-3320 Velenje, (hereinafter: Gorenje, d.d.) hereby publicly announces that it intends, consistently with its policy to diversify its financing sources, to issue 5-year corporate notes. The resolution on the issue of ordinary notes with the symbol GV01 was adopted by the company on September 30, 2014. By issuing the notes, Gorenje, d.d., is looking to further strengthen its debt maturity profile and diversify its long-term financing sources which are currently restricted to mostly banking sources.

item.title: Gorenje the first Slovenian company with a European Works Council
item.description: Gorenje Group is the first international enterprise headquartered in Slovenia to found a European Works Council consisting of employees working in European Union member states. The founding session of Gorenje's European Works Council took place on September 25 in Velenje

item.title: Golden award for Gorenje innovators
item.description: Slovenian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (SCCI) presented today its twelfth national awards for the most innovative companies and innovators at enterprises and public research institutes. Gorenje innovators received a golden award for the new generation of 600-mm-wide fridge freezers.

item.title: Gorenje considers bond issue
item.description: Pursuant to Article 386 of the Financial Instruments Market Act (ZTFI), the company GORENJE, d.d., Partizanska cesta 12, SI-3320 Velenje (hereinafter: GORENJE, d.d.), hereby publicly announces that the company GORENJE, d.d., consistently with its policy of diversification of financing sources, is analyzing the possibilities for the issue of bonds. The issuer's decision on actual bond issue, type of bond, coupon, and nominal size of the issue will be adopted based on the market conditions and investor response or interest.

item.title: In Berlin, Gorenje unveils HomeMade personal kitchen assistants
item.description: Gorenje Group is back at the world's leading consumer electronics and home appliance tradeshow taking place in Berlin from September 5 to 10. In addition to this year's key new launch, the new generation of HomeMade personal kitchen assistants.

item.title: Information about the change of the total number of shares with the voting right - 29 August 2014
item.description: The Issuer has increased share capital and the number of shares, based on AGM resolution dated on the 23rd of August, 2013, by 1,005,020 GRVG shares. The total number of all issued GRVG shares has been changed from 23,419,593 shares to 24,424,613 shares. Due to the fact, that one share has one vote, is the new total number of voting rights 24,424,613. Number of own shares remains unchanged, namely 121,311 shares, but theirs portion has decreased to 0.4967%.

item.title: Trading with newly issued stock starts on the Warsaw Stock Exchange
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., hereby announces the public that on Friday, August 29, 2014, trading with newly issued stock will commence on the Warsaw Stock Exchange as well. This announcement pertains to the 2,320,186 new shares subscribed in the capital increase procedure by Gorenjska banka, d.d., Kranj (1,315,166 shares) and the IFC (1,005,020 shares); all of the said shares are already listed on the Ljubljana Stock Exchange. As a result, all 24,424,613 GRVG shares are listed on both the Ljubljana Stock Exchange and the Warsaw Stock Exchange as of August 29, 2014.

item.title: Information on major holding of voting rights – 25 August 2014
item.description: The company Alpen.SI, mixed flexible subfund – South-Eastern Europe, Trdinova ulica 4, SI-1000 Ljubljana, Slovenia, informed us on 22 August, 2014 that due to the third round of the capital increase of the new 1,005,020 shares issued by the company Gorenje, d.d., and subscribed by IFC, the stake of the voting rights of the company from the 18 August, 2014 decreased from 5.0446% to 4.8370% of all voting rights in the company Gorenje, d.d. At the same time, we are informing the public, that on 13 August, 2014 the stake of the voting rights in the company Gorenje, d.d. of the company IFC increased from 8.0141% to 11.7991%.

item.title: Webcast on first half 2014 results
item.description: On August 22 at 1.30 PM CET, Gorenje President and CEO Franjo Bobinac and CFO Peter Groznik will discuss Gorenje’s first half results in a live webcast. To attend the webcast and raise questions for the speakers, follow the link below: https://altasi.webex.com/altasi/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=955764592 Password: Alta2014. The language of the webcast will be English.

item.title: Gorenje Group performance in the first half of 2014
item.description: Following the positive first quarter of the year when Gorenje Group profit reached EUR 1 million, the second quarter bottom line is a further notch higher at EUR 2.1 million. Thus, the profit for the first half totals at EUR 3.1 million, which is consistent with the plan for the year. Improvement over the first half of the year earlier is a result of successful restructuring and better sales. Revenue reached EUR 600.7 million, up 1.8% from the first half of 2013. The steepest revenue growth was seen in Germany, Russia, Bulgaria, Romania, Great Britain, North America, Czech Republic, and Slovakia.

item.title: Press release regarding the first Gorenje Supervisory Board session
item.description: At the first session of the new Gorenje, d.d., Supervisory Board, held today, Marko Voljč was appointed Supervisory Board chairman, while Krešimir Martinjak, Bernard C. Pasquier and Uroš Slavinec were appointed deputy chairmen. All were appointed unanimously.

item.title: Changes in ownership stakes held by members of the Management and Supervisory Board - 14 August 2014
item.description:
Issuer: Gorenje gospodinjski aparati, d.d. (short name: Gorenje, d.d.), Partizanska 12, SI-3320 Velenje, Slovenia

item.title: Information about the change of the total number of shares with the voting right 31 July 2014
item.description: The Issuer has increased share capital and the number of shares, based on AGM resolution dated on the 23rd of August, 2013, by 1,315,166 GRVG shares. The total number of all issued GRVG shares has been changed from 22,104,427 shares to 23,419,593 shares. Due to the fact, that one share has one vote, is the new total number of voting rights 23,419,593. Number of own shares remains unchanged, namely 121,311 shares, but theirs portion has decreased to 0.5180%

item.title: Public notice about changes of share capital, number of shares and of statute 18 July 2014
item.description: On 21 July 2014, based on the finished procedure of subscribed and paid new shares of Gorenje, d.d., the company Gorenje, d.d., has received the resolution of the court register, Celje, No. Srg 2014/32359, dated on 18 July 2014. This resolution is relating to the registration of share capital changes from EUR 97,728,229.83 to EUR 101,922,103.97, number of shares from 23,419,593 to 24,424,613 and changes of statute, related to above quoted changes.

item.title: IFC and Gorenje agree to debt-to-equity conversion
item.description: Gorenje signed with International Finance Corporation (IFC) signed a debt-to-equity conversion agreement for 1,005,020 newly issued shares. The agreement is consistent with the resolution of the 20th Gorenje, d.d., Shareholders Assembly of August 23, 2013 on the increase of share capital by in-kind contributions. Gorenje has recently also signed a debt-to-equity conversion agreement with Gorenjska banka which subscribed 1,315,166 new shares. The IFC debt to equity swap successfully completes Gorenje's third capital increase.

item.title: Prospectus for the admission to trading on a regulated market of the Gorenje, d.d., shares
item.description: The company Gorenje, d.d., received on 16 July 2014 the decision by the Securities Market Agency No. 40200-5/2014-5 from 15 July 2014 on the approval of the prospectus for the admission to trading on a regulated market of the 1,005,020 ordinary, freely transferable, no par value shares in a registered, book-entry form with the symbol GRVG. Shares will be also listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange.

item.title: Gorenje and VTB Bank sign a loan agreement
item.description: Gorenje and VTB Bank (Austria) AG signed an agreement on a five-year long-term loan in the amount of EUR 72 million, which will be used to refinance Gorenje's current debt and, in turn, improve the maturity profile of the Group's financial resources and its financial stability.

item.title: Public notice about changes of share capital, number of shares and of statute
item.description: On 11 July 2014, based on the finished procedure of subscribed and paid new shares of Gorenje, d.d., the company Gorenje, d.d., has received the resolution of the court register, Celje, No. Srg 2014/31489, dated on 11 July 2014. This resolution is relating to the registration of share capital changes from EUR 92,240,139.36 to EUR 97,728,229.83, number of shares from 22,104,427 to 23,419,593 and changes of statute, related to above quoted changes.

item.title: Gorenje signs a debt-to-equity conversion agreement with Gorenjska banka
item.description: Pursuant to the resolution adopted by Gorenje's 20th Shareholders Assembly, dated August 23, 2013, on the increase of share capital by non-cash contributions, Gorenje and Gorenjska banka signed today a debt-to-equity conversion agreement according to which receivables in the amount of EUR 5,668,365.46 held by Gorenjska banka are to be exchanged for Gorenje stock. Gorenjska banka will subscribe the shares at a price of EUR 4.31 per share, which was also confirmed at the 20th Shareholders Assembly, and thus acquire 1,315,166 newly issued Gorenje shares.

item.title: New long-term syndicated loan for Gorenje
item.description: Gorenje signed an agreement on a long-term syndicated loan approved by a syndicate of six banks. NLB, SID Banka, Banka Koper, Nova KBM, Abanka Vipa, and Gorenjska banka granted to Gorenje a long-term loan of EUR 55 million. The maturity of the loan is seven years.

item.title: Gorenje announces signing of long-term syndicated loan agreement
item.description: An agreement on a long-term syndicated loan to Gorenje, d.d., provided by NLB, SID banka, Abanka Vipa, Banka Koper, Gorenjska banka and NKBM will be signed on July 9, 2014 at 10.30 a.m., at the NLB, d.d., head offices in Ljubljana. NLB is also the bookrunner/agent in the deal.

item.title: Resolutions passed at the 21st Annual General Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: At the twenty-first Gorenje, d.d., Shareholders Assembly held today in Velenje, the shareholders approved the increase of the number of capital representatives in the Supervisory Board from six to seven, and elected the capital representatives for the new term lasting from July 20, 2014 to July 20, 2018. The shareholders were also informed of the four employee representatives in the Supervisory Board, previously elected by the Works Council. Moreover, Gorenje President and CEO Franjo Bobinac presented to the shareholders last year's operations and performance, as well as the plans for this year and the performance estimate for this year's first half. The shareholders attending today's Assembly accounted for 65.55% of capital bearing voting right.

item.title: Prospectus for the admission to trading on a regulated market of the Gorenje d.d., shares
item.description: The company Gorenje, d.d., received on 1 July 2014 the decision by the Securities Market Agency on the approval of the prospectus for the admission to trading on a regulated market of the 1,315,166 ordinary, freely transferable, no par value shares in a registered, book-entry form with the symbol GRVG. Shares will be also listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange.

item.title: Gorenje, d.d., Supervisory Board announcement
item.description: The Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., approves the resolution adopted by the company Management Board based on the resolution of the 20th Shareholders Assembly dated August 23, 2013, to increase the company share capital by up to EUR 9,681,964.61 by issuing up to 2,320,186 ordinary freely transferable registered no-par value shares in exchange for non-cash contributions.

item.title: Organised Collection of Proxies for Shareholders to Exercise Their Voting Rights.
item.description: Throughout the years, Gorenje, d.d., has been encouraging all shareholders to actively exercise their rights by organised collection of proxies and in accordance with the Slovenian Corporate Governance Code recommendation is announcing that as of today, the company officers authorised to collect proxies i.e.

item.title: Start of procedure for increase of share capital
item.description: Pursuant to Article 386 of the Financial Instruments Market Act (ZTFI), the company Gorenje, d.d., Partizanska cesta 12, 3320 Velenje (hereinafter: the Company), hereby informs the public that it has launched a capital increase procedure based on authorized capital, by non-cash contributions, based on the resolution of the 20th Shareholders Assembly of the Company, dated August 23, 2013.

item.title: Gorenje team wins the Plus X Award for the 11th consecutive year
item.description: Steam oven of the Gorenje+ line wins the award in the categories of quality, design, user-friendliness, and functionality.

item.title: Counter-proposal to the Shareholders Assembly resolutions
item.description: With regard to the 21st Shareholders Assembly of the company Gorenje gospodinjski aparati, d. d., scheduled to take place on Friday, July 4th 2014 at 11.00 hours at the Grand Hall of the Paka Hotel in Velenje, Rudarska Street 1, the Management Board of the company Gorenje, d.d., hereby informs the shareholders that on June 2nd 2014, the company received a counter-proposal from NFD 1, multi-asset flexible sub-fund – Southeastern Europe, to the item 5 of the agenda, "Appointment of Supervisory Board members"

item.title: Convocation of the 21st Shareholder's Assembly Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: Pursuant to relevant legislation, the Management Board and the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., hereby convene the 21st Shareholder's Assembly Meeting of Gorenje, d.d., to be held on Friday, July 4, 2014 at 11 AM in the Grand Conference Hall at the Hotel Paka in Velenje, Rudarska ul. 1, Slovenia.

item.title: Gorenje Group wraps up the first quarter with profit
item.description: The restructuring program carried out by the Gorenje Group in the last two years, which included relocating manufacturing operations and restructuring the sales network, has brought about material positive results. Owing to restructuring efforts, higher revenue, and improved structure of sales the Group brought the first quarter of the year to a close with net profit of EUR 1 million. Compared to the equivalent period of last year when the Group saw a loss of EUR 4.2 million, the result is better by EUR 5.2 million. EBITDA amounted to EUR 20.8 million, which is 29% above the figure for the first quarter of 2013. The Supervisory Board addressed the first quarter performance of the Group and its parent company at the session held on April 24.

item.title: Audited consolidated and unconsolidated annual report for the year 2013
item.description: At the 50th meeting, held on the 24th of April, 2014, the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., adopted audited Annual Report of Gorenje, d.d., and the Consolidated Annual Report of the Gorenje Group for the year 2013, and confirmed the proposal for the application of the balance-sheet profit for the year 2013. The Supervisory Board adopted the Report on the revision of Annual Report, which will be submitted to the Annual General Meeting.

item.title: The 50th Supervisory Board Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: At the 50th meeting, held on the 24th of April, 2014, the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., adopted audited Annual Report of Gorenje, d.d., and the Consolidated Annual Report of the Gorenje Group for the year 2013, and confirmed the proposal for the application of the balance-sheet profit for the year 2013. The Supervisory Board adopted the Report on the revision of Annual Report, which will be submitted to the Annual General Meeting.

item.title: Corporate governance policy of the company Gorenje, d.d. and Gorenje Group
item.description: At the 24th regular Management Board meeting held on April 22, 2014, and 50th regular Supervisory Board meeting held on April 24, 2014, the said bodies of governance of the company Gorenje, d.d., adopted the updated Corporate governance policy of the company Gorenje, d.d. and Gorenje Group.

item.title: Statement of Compliance with the Corporate Governance Code
item.description: The statement pertains to the period from the adoption of the previous Statement of Compliance with the Corporate Governance Code (for Public Limited Companies), i.e. from April 19, 2013 to April 24, 2014 when the Statement was jointly formulated and adopted by the Management Board and the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d.

item.title: Code of Conduct at the Gorenje Group
item.description: Approved by resolution of the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., dated April 24, 2014 The purpose of this Code of Conduct is to: · Commit the Company to the highest standards of business and ethical behaviour; · Encourage ethical conduct and sanction misconduct within the Company; and · Develop an ethical culture within the Company that is based on such standards and conduct, and that will be applied by directors, management and employees alike.

item.title: Change of the financial calendar for 2014
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., hereby announces a change in the release dates for the Annual Report of the company Gorenje, d.d., and the Gorenje Group for the year 2013, and the Business Report for the company Gorenje, d.d., and the Gorenje Group in the period January–March 2014.

item.title: SILENT PERIOD: from 10 Apr. 2014 to 24 Apr. 2014
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. has a silent period of 15 days before each quarterly financial report announcement.

item.title: Admission of commercial paper issued by Gorenje, d.d., to trading on a regulated market
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., hereby announces a successful sale of 9-month commercial paper. Commercial paper with the identification code GRV02 has a 4.00% interest rate and the total nominal value of the issue amounts to EUR 35m.

item.title: Gorenje successfully issues commercial paper with a total face value of EUR 35 million
item.description: On March 25, 2014 the company Gorenje, d.d., successfully issued 9-month commercial paper with a total face value of EUR 35 million and interest rate of 4 percent. Interest in Gorenje's commercial paper was higher than expected, indicating investor confidence enjoyed by Gorenje. By issuing the commercial paper, Gorenje is diversifying its short-term debt and managing the interim oscillations in free cash flow generation.

item.title: 'Red dots' for Gorenje Group design
item.description: Gorenje design won another international Red Dot award for product design this year. The 40-member expert jury was impressed by two Gorenje Group designs: built-in oven with interactive colour touch display of the Gorenje brand, and the built-in oven of the Pro Series™ line of the Asko brand.

item.title: Changes in ownership stakes held by members of the Management and Supervisory Board
item.description: On the 17th March, 2014 Member of the Management Board Mr Peter Groznik bought 2,500 Gorenje, d.d., GRVG shares at the Ljubljana Stock Exchange in the amount of EUR 9,999.25. After this transaction Mr Groznik holds 7,140 GRVG shares or 0.0325% of voting rights.

item.title: Gorenje planning a second issue of commercial papers
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., is planning a second issue of commercial papers on March 25, 2014, with maturity of 9 months and yield to maturity of 400 basis points. The company is presenting detailed information on the issue of commercial papers at a meeting with potential investors held today, March 14, 2014. On behalf of Gorenje, activities regarding the issue and offering of commercial papers are managed by the company Alta Invest.

item.title: The two-year restructuring program completed in 2013 lays the foundation for revenue growth and profits in 2014
item.description: At today's session, Gorenje, d.d., Supervisory Board was presented the unaudited consolidated financial statements of the Gorenje Group and its parent company Gorenje, d.d., for the year 2013.

item.title: Change of the financial calendar for the year 2014
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., will publish Unaudited consolidated financial statements of the Gorenje Group and Gorenje, d.d., for the year 2013, on 13 March 2014 in the afternoon and not on 14 March 2014 as announced in the financial calendar.

item.title: SILENT PERIOD: from 27 Feb. 2014 to 13 Mar. 2014
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. has a silent period of 15 days before each quarterly financial report announcement. During the silent period the company will not arrange meetings with investors, analysts, or the media.

item.title: Gorenje Group and American premium appliance manufacturer Sub-Zero Group Inc. launch a distribution partnership
item.description: Gorenje Group and the leading manufacturer of American-made premium home appliances Sub-Zero Group Inc. signed a long-term agreement on the distribution of Gorenje's premium brand Asko.

item.title: Gorenje Group 2014 Business Plan and 2013 performance estimate
item.description: Gorenje Group's plans for 2014 include 3.6-percent revenue growth, operating profit (EBIT) of EUR 46.4 million and net income (profit) of EUR 12.1 million, as well as strengthening of finances by deleveraging and higher cash flows from operating activities. The notable improvement of performance is to result from intensive restructuring program carried out by the Group over the last two years, which involved strategic relocations of manufacturing operations, restructuring of sales network, cost rationalization, divestment of non-core and underperforming assets, capital increase through public equity offering, and other measures to improve the Group's financial position.

item.title: For the first time in its corporate history, Gorenje Group manufactures dishwashers in Slovenia
item.description: In addition to cold, hot, and laundry care appliances, Gorenje Group has also been producing dishwashers since autumn last year. The addition of the new manufacturing program was celebrated with a special event that included a symbolic launch of the five-station sheet metal processing conveyor line.

item.title: Gorenje, d.d., public announcement
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., will release the summary of the 2014 business plan on January 31, 2014. The date of announcement complies with international practice and standards of a quiet period following a public offering.

item.title: Information on major holding of voting rights
item.description: The company NFD 1, mešani fleksibilni podsklad – Jugovzhodna Evropa, Trdinova ulica 4, 1000 Ljubljana, Slovenia, informed us on 3rd January 2014 that due to the acquisition of shares of the issuer Gorenje, d.d., in the capital increase procedure, the stake of the voting rights increased from 3.4334% to 5.0931% of voting rights in the company Gorenje, d.d. as of 27th December 2013.

item.title: Public announcement of the company Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: Pursuant to the provisions of the Financial Operations, Insolvency Proceedings and Compulsory Dissolution Act (ZFPPIPP) which came into effect on December 7, 2013, the company Merkur, d.d., has announced its long-term insolvency resulting from excessive debt and capital inadequacy..

item.description: The Issuer has increased share capital and the number of shares, based on AGM resolution dated on the 23rd of August, 2013, by 3,877,365 GRVG shares. The total number of all issued GRVG shares has been changed from 18,227,062 shares to 22,104,427 shares. Due to the fact, that one share has one vote, is the new total number of voting rights 22,104,427. Number of own shares remains unchanged, namely 121,311 shares, but theirs portion has decreased to 0.5488%.

item.title: Changes in ownership stakes held by members of the Management and Supervisory Board
item.description: The following members of the Management and Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., purchased newly issued shares of Gorenje, d.d., offered in the Offering:

item.title: As of December 30, 2013 Gorenje shares listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange
item.description: On December 30, 2013 Gorenje, d.d., shares were admitted to the Warsaw Stock Exchange for the company stock's secondary listing. As of today, all 22,104,427 ordinary Gorenje shares that had previously only been listed on the Ljubljana Stock Exchange are also traded on the Warsaw Stock Exchange.

item.title: Public notice about changes of share capital, number of shares and of statute
item.description: On 23 December 2013., based on the finished procedure of subscribed and paid new shares of Gorenje, d.d., the company Gorenje, d.d., has received the resolution of the court register, Celje, No. Srg 2013/54315, dated on 23 December 2013.

item.title: Gorenje repays commercial paper holders
item.description: The company Gorenje, d.d., paid out on Friday, the 20th of December, 2013, the holders of 8-month commercial paper issued on the 25th of April, 2013 with the total face value repaid amounts to EUR 24.2 million.

item.title: Gorenje successfully completes the second offering of its shares
item.description: After completing one capital increase this autumn when the Panasonic Corporation, of Japan, contributed EUR 10 million, Gorenje wrapped up the second offering of its shares on December 17, which took place in Slovenia and Poland.

item.title: The next step of the public offering completed. Still ahead are the remaining payments by new investors and admission of shares to the Warsaw Stock Exchange
item.description: December 11, 2013 was the last they of the window for share subscription by retail investors in Poland, and for the bookbuilding process addressing the institutional investors in Poland and invited investors in Slovenia.

item.title: First round of Gorenje's equity offering drawn to a close; in the second round, shares will be offered to employees and new shareholders
item.description: First round of Gorenje's equity offering drawn to a close; in the second round, shares will be offered to employees and new shareholders Gorenje shares are scheduled to be listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange by the end of this year.

item.title: Gorenje Group performance in the first nine months of the year and end-of-year estimate
item.description: Operating profit reached EUR 23.6 million, which is nearly 6% more than in the first three quarters of last year. Group results were affected by non-recurring negative effects of furniture operations divestment, impairment of financial investments, and negative currency translation differences.

item.title: Following the successful strategic alliance with Panasonic, Gorenje embarks on a new capital increase that includes secondary listing on the Warsaw Stock Exchange
item.description: Tomorrow, November 20, 2013, Gorenje will launch the offering of its 10,440,835 newly issued shares. The issue value of these shares will amount to EUR 45 million. Price per share is set at EUR 4.31, which is the same as the price in the first capital increase in which the Japanese corporation Panasonic subscribed and paid Gorenje shares with a total value of good EUR 10 million.

item.title: Financial calendar for the year 2013 - Change
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. is publishing the change in anticipated release date (the 15th of November, 2013) for the Interim Report of Gorenje, d.d., and Gorenje Group for January-September 2013 and releasing its financial calendar for the year 2013 in the attached file.

item.title: Information about the change of the total number of shares with the voting right
item.description: The Issuer has increased share capital and the number of shares, based on AGM resolution dated on the 23rd of August, 2013, by 2,320,186 GRVG shares. The total number of all issued GRVG shares has been changed from 15,906,876 shares to 18,227,062 shares.

item.title: Gorenje Group announces an updated Strategic Plan for the period 2014–2018
item.description: On October 29, 2013, the Supervisory Board adopted an updated Gorenje Group Strategic Plan for the period from 2014 to 2018. Gorenje decided to revise its strategy after having completed the process of strategic shifts of manufacturing operations, forging a strategic alliance with the Panasonic Corporation, divesting their furniture manufacturing operations, and reorganizing and optimizing their sales structure, all in the course of the last 18 months. Such changes affect the Group operations. Moreover, the updated strategy deals with the unrelentingly harsh conditions in the markets.

item.title: Information on major holding of voting rights
item.description: PANASONIC CORPORATION, 1006 Oaza Kadoma, Kadomacity 571-8501, Osaka, Japan, informed us on 17th October 2013, that as on 11th October 2013 they acquired 2,320,186 shares issued by the company Gorenje, d.d.

item.title: Financial calendar for the year 2014
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., is releasing its financial calendar for the year 2014!

item.title: Public notice about changes of share capital, number of shares and of statute
item.description: On 4 October 2013 has Gorenje, d.d., based on the finished procedure of subscribed and paid new shares of Gorenje, d.d., received the resolution of the court register, Celje, No. Srg 2013/40264, dated on 4 October 2013. This resolution is relating to the registration of share capital changes from EUR 66,378,217.32 to EUR 76,060,181.93, number of shares from 15,906,876 to 18,227,062 and changes of statute, related to above quoted changes.

item.title: Gorenje obtains a syndicated loan from SID banka and NLB
item.description: Gorenje President and CEO Franjo Bobinac, Management Board President at NLB Janko Medja, and Management Board President at SID banka Sibil Svilan signed today, September 19, an agreement according to which NLB and SID banka would provide a long-term syndicated loan of EUR 30 million to Gorenje.

item.title: Gorenje wins golden and silver CCIS award
item.description: Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Slovenia (GZS) announced at the Innovation Day yesterday the award winners for best innovations in Slovenia in the last year. Award recipients include Gorenje and its development team. Gorenje IQcook induction hob won the golden award, and the new generation of washing machines and dryers Gorenje SensoCare won the silver award.

item.title: Gorenje announces signing of long-term syndicated loan agreement with NLB and SID bank
item.description: On September 19 at 2PM, Gorenje President and CEO Franjo Bobinac, NLB management board president Janko Medja, and management board president at SID bank Sibil Svilan will sign in Gorenje Studio in Velenje an agreement on a long-term syndicated loan provided by NLB and SID to Gorenje. After the signing of the agreement Mr. Bobinac, Mr. Medja and Mr. Svilan will be available for comments.

item.title: Prospectus for the admission to trading on a regulated market of the Gorenje, d.d., shares
item.description: The company Gorenje, d.d., received on 13 September 2013 the decision by the Securities Market Agency on the approval of the prospectus for the admission to trading on a regulated market of the 2,320,186 ordinary, freely transferable, no par value shares in a registered, book-entry form with the symbol GRVG.

item.title: Gorenje at the IFA tradeshow in Berlin
item.description: 6. September was opening day of the world's leading consumer electronics and home appliance tradeshow IFA in Berlin. Gorenje is showcasing its product novelties that his fair for the sixth consecutive year; this time, two brands are being presented at the same time: Gorenje and Asko. IFA ranks among the top ten media events in the world considering the number of media teams that come to the Berlin fair.

item.title: Gorenje at the IFA global marketplace 2013
item.description: Gorenje is again among the exhibitors at the IFA, the world’s leading consumer electronics and home appliance tradeshow. This year, Gorenje is rising to new challenges with a striking new stand concept and an exhibition spanning two floors and 750 m2. For the first time, the Gorenje stand includes the exciting premium Asko brand alongside the Gorenje brand highlights.

item.title: Performance affected by macroeconomic conditions, currency translation differences, and strategic shifts of manufacturing operations
item.description: In the first half of the year, Gorenje Group performance was affected by four key factors: 1.2-percent drop of the European home appliance market; depreciation of some currencies, especially the Russian rouble, Swedish crown, Serbian dinar, and Australian dollar relative to the euro; activities and investments related to the strategic relocations of manufacturing operations; and impairment of some investments. Group revenue in the amount of EUR 590.1 million was 2.7% lower than in the first half of 2012.

item.title: Resolutions passed at the 20th Annual General Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: The Management Board of Gorenje, d.d., hereby announces the resolutions passed at the 20th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Gorenje, d.d.

item.title: SILENT PERIOD: 18 August 2013 - 29 August 2013
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. has a silent period of 15 days before each quarterly financial report announcement. During the silent period the company will not arrange meetings with investors, analysts, or the media.

item.title: Organised Collection of Proxies for Shareholders to Exercise Their Voting Rights
item.description: Throughout the years, Gorenje, d.d., has been encouraging all shareholders to actively exercise their rights by organised collection of proxies and in accordance with the Slovenian Corporate Governance Code recommendation is announcing that as of today, the company officers authorised to collect proxies have started collecting proxies for the shareholders to exercise their voting rights at the 20th Annual General Meeting of Gorenje, d.d., scheduled for the 23rd of August, 2013.

item.title: After yesterday's breakout of fire at Gorenje's waste collection and processing subsidiary in Maribor yesterday afternoon, the situation is settling down
item.description: Situation at the plant of Gorenje's subsidiary Gorenje Surovina in Maribor, where a fire broke out yesterday afternoon in the waste collection and processing area, is settling down.The fire destroyed two thirds of the industrial hall for collection and processing of waste, as well as the solar power plant installed on the rooftop of this facility. The amount of damage is still being assessed at the company. The cause of the fire will be identified during the ensuing investigation.

item.title: Convocation of the 20th Shareholder's Assembly Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: Pursuant to relevant legislation, the Management Board and the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., hereby convene the 20th Shareholder's Assembly Meeting of Gorenje, d.d., to be held on Friday, August 23, 2013 at 11.00 AM in the Grand Conference Hall at the Hotel Paka in Velenje, Rudarska ul. 1, Slovenia.

item.title: Gorenje opens its second refrigerator factory in Valjevo
item.description: On Tuesday, July 11, 2013, Gorenje held a festive opening ceremony for its second cooling appliance plant in Valjevo. Attending the opening ceremony were Gorenje President and CEO Franjo Bobinac, other members of Gorenje Management Board and Supervisory Board, Prime Minister of the Republic of Serbia Ivica Dačić, Minister of Finance and Economy of the Republic of Serbia Mlađan Dinkić, and the mayor of the city of Valjevo Stanko Terzić.

item.title: Gorenje Group and the Republic of Serbia sign a preliminary agreement on joint investment into Gorenje production facilities in Serbia
item.description: Gorenje Group and the Government of the Republic of Serbia signed today a preliminary agreement on the intended joint investment into Gorenje manufacturing facilities in Valjevo, Stara Pazova, and Zaječar.

item.title: Resolutions passed at the 19th Annual General Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: The Management Board of Gorenje, d.d., Partizanska 12, Velenje, Slovenia, pursuant to the provisions of the Companies Act (ZGD-1), the Market of Financial Instruments Act (ZTFI), the Ljubljana Stock Exchange Rules and the Corporate Governance Code for Joint Stock Companies, hereby announces the resolutions passed at the 19th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Gorenje, d.d., held on Friday, July 5th 2013, starting at 9.00 AM, in the Grand Hall of Hotel Paka in Velenje, Rudarska ul. 1, Slovenia.

item.title: Gorenje and Panasonic Create Strategic Alliance
item.description: Gorenje Group and Panasonic Corporation announced on July 5, 2013 the creation of a long-term strategic alliance that will leverage the combined strengths and capabilities of the two companies, contribute to the profitability of both partners and improve their competitiveness in Europe, to the benefit of consumers.

item.title: Organised Collection of Proxies for Shareholders to Exercise Their Voting Rights
item.description: Throughout the years, Gorenje, d.d., has been encouraging all shareholders to actively exercise their rights by organised collection of proxies and in accordance with the Slovenian Corporate Governance Code recommendation is announcing that as of today, the company officers authorised to collect proxies i.e.

item.title: Convocation of the 19th Shareholder's Assembly Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: Pursuant to relevant legislation, the Management Board and the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., hereby convene the 19th Shareholder's Assembly Meeting of Gorenje, d.d., to be held on Friday, July 5, 2013 at 9 AM in the Grand Conference Hall at the Hotel Paka in Velenje, Rudarska ul. 1, Slovenia.

item.title: Gorenje performance in the first quarter consistent with expectations, considering the challenging relocations of manufacturing operations
item.description: Gorenje Group performance in the first quarter of the year was consistent with the expectations, considering the challenging restructuring of manufacturing operations and the 2.6-percent drop in demand in Europe. Revenue of EUR 289.4 million was down 1.4% relative to first quarter of the year before, due to the drop in revenue from portfolio investments and waste management services. On the other hand, the Group's revenue from the core activity of home products and services rose by 0.5%, especially due to growth of sales in the Eastern Europe.

item.title: SILENT PERIOD: 8 May 2013 - 23 May 2013
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. has a silent period of 15 days before each quarterly financial report announcement. During the silent period the company will not arrange meetings with investors, analysts, or the media.

item.title: Admission of commercial paper issued by Gorenje, d.d. to trading on a regulated market
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. is announcing a successful sale of 8-month commercial paper despite a tough macroeconomic environment which is present in Slovenia.

item.title: Gorenje successfully issues 8-month commercial papers with a total face value of EUR 21 million
item.description: On April 25, 2013, Gorenje, d. d., successfully issued 8-month commercial papers with a total face value of EUR 21 million and an interest rate of 4.45%. By issuing the commercial papers, Gorenje is diversifying its short-term debt and managing the interim oscillations in free cash flow generation.

item.title: Gorenje Group publishes Annual Report 2012
item.description: At the 35th meeting, held on the 18th of April, 2013, the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., adopted audited Annual Report of Gorenje, d.d., and the Consolidated Annual Report of the Gorenje Group for the year 2012, and confirmed the proposal for the application of the balance-sheet profit for the year 2012. The Supervisory Board adopted the Report on the revision of Annual Report, which will be submitted to the Annual General Meeting.

item.title: Asko washing machines and dryers already produced at Gorenje's Velenje plant
item.description: Gorenje has completed the relocation of washing machine and dryer production from Sweden to Velenje. Relocated production line was launched at the Velenje factory as planned. Gorenje employees were joined by the members of the Management Board and Supervisory Board today to celebrate the launch of Asko-branded washing machine and dryer production in Velenje by symbolically starting up the automated washing machine tub line.

item.title: Gorenje planning an issue of commercial papers
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., is planning an issue of commercial papers on April 25, 2013, with maturity of 8 months and yield to maturity of 445 basis points.

item.title: Gorenje announces unaudited consolidated financial statements for the 2012 fiscal year
item.description: Sales peak in the last quarter. 2012 was wrapped up with a lower debt and higher free cash flow. Re-locations in progress as planned. Positive effects of re-locations expected at the end of 2013.

item.title: Gorenje wins five prestigious red dot awards for 2013
item.description: At this year's red dot international contest, Gorenje Group won five prestigious red dot design awards 2013. Among the Gorenje brand products, the award went to outdoor unit of the Gorenje Aerogor heat pump and the SensoCare NGPS12 new generation washing machine, both designed by the Gorenje Design Studio, three awards were won by cooking hobs of the Atag brand.

item.title: SILENT PERIOD: 28 February 2013 - 14 March 2013
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. has a silent period of 15 days before each quarterly financial report announcement. During the silent period the company will not arrange meetings with investors, analysts, or the media.

item.title: Gorenje divests its furniture manufacturing operations to CoBe Capital investment firm
item.description: Gorenje signed today an agreement with CoBe Capital, a global private investment firm focused on operation of non-core and underperforming business units, on the sale of Gorenje Kuhinje and Gorenje Notranja oprema, thus withdrawing from the furniture manufacturing segment.

item.title: Gorenje launches mass production at the new cold appliance plant in Valjevo
item.description: Gorenje Group launched mass production at the new cold appliance plant in Valjevo, Serbia. This is Gorenje's second refrigerator-freezer facility in Valjevo. The first one was opened in 2006. The combined output of both plants for this year is planned at nearly 800,000. Investment into the new plant amounted to good EUR 21 million; the launch of mass production was on schedule.

item.title: Gorenje opens its first showroom in Israel
item.description: Working with its business partner H. Y. Group, Gorenje opened in late January its first showroom in an elite location near Tel Aviv. The showroom will showcase the broadest selection of Gorenje's upmarket designer home appliances. The opening symbolically marks the launch of Gorenje's operations in the Israeli market where high-end appliances will primarily address the affluent consumers.

item.title: Gorenje Orodjarna completes an extensive technological upgrade of manufacturing equipment
item.description: Gorenje's toolmaking subsidiary, company Gorenje Orodjarna, completed last year an extensive technological update to their production floor by investing in three new machines that will boost the company's competitiveness. The updated equipment worth over EUR 900,000, the company will be able to vie for new orders and commissions, including those from the aerospace industry.

item.title: Gorenje back at the LivingKitchen @ IMM in Cologne
item.description: Gorenje is taking part in the "LivingKitchen 2013" Exhibition, starting on January 14th and lasting through January 20th 2013, parallel to the IMM Cologne 2013 fair. The rather new international event LivingKitchen is a trade fair focusing on all aspects of kitchens, offering both trade visitors and the general public an opportunity to experience the home interiors of the future.

item.title: Gorenje Supervisory Board appointed other Management Board members for the term 2013–2018
item.description: At today's session the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., confirmed the proposal by the President and CEO and the Remuneration Committee on the appointment of the remaining Management Board members for the term 2013–2018. The Management Board in this term will consist of current Management Board members except Mr. Uroš Marolt who will remain with the Gorenje Group. The Management Board will commence their new term on July 19, 2013.

item.title: Gorenje announces the performance estimate for this year and the business plan for the year ahead
item.description: Gorenje Supervisory Board was presented the performance estimate for the year and approved the business plan for the year ahead. In 2013, Gorenje is planning revenue of EUR 1.3 billion, which is 4.5% more than the estimated figure for this year. Sales will rise especially in the markets where average profitability is higher (Russia, Ukraine, Slovenia, Czech Republic, Poland, Slovakia, and China); sales in Germany will rise as well.

item.title: Brief to the Supervisory Board regarding the unannounced strike of Gorenje employees on December 12
item.description: Gorenje Supervisory Board was presented the Management Board's report on the progress and circumstances of the unannounced strike that took place on December 12, 2012 and as a result of which production was stopped for over four hours. The Board supported the measures that brought the strike quickly to an end and therefore effectively minimized the damage sustained by the company due to the strike. If the unannounced strike had lasted longer, financial and strategic consequences for the company would have been much more serious both in the short and in the long term.

item.title: Press release after the Gorenje Supervisory Board session
item.description: The Supervisory Board will appoint the remaining Management Board members for the following term in January 2013.

item.title: Gorenje floats a EUR 50 million long-term syndicated loan from Sberbank Europe
item.description: Gorenje, d.d., and Volksbank, d.d., signed on December 11 an agreement on a syndicated loan to be provided by the following banks of the Sberbank Europe Group: Volksbank, d.d., Slovenia; Volksbank Serbia; Volksbank Croatia; and Volksbank Slovakia.

item.title: Challenging business environment leaves its mark on the third quarter
item.description: At yesterday's session, Gorenje Supervisory Board discussed the business report of the Gorenje Group and its parent company for the first nine months of this year. Particularly in the first two months of the third quarter, performance was marred by further aggravation of conditions in Gorenje Group's key markets. Operations were also affected by higher costs, especially those of transport services and costs related to relocation of manufacturing plants.

item.title: Serbian prime minister visits Gorenje
item.description: Serbian Prime Minister Mr. Ivica Dačić, who is also the country's Minister of the Interior, visited Gorenje today during his two-day stay in Slovenia. Accompanied by Gorenje President and CEO Mr. Franjo Bobinac and Management Board members Mr. Branko Apat and Mr. Marko Mrzel, he took a tour of the cooking appliances plant, the high-tech logistics center Navis, and the in-house showroom.

item.title: SILENT PERIOD: 1 November 2012 - 15 November 2012
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. has a silent period of 15 days before each quarterly financial report announcement. During the silent period the company will not arrange meetings with investors, analysts, or the media.

item.title: Financial calendar for the year 2013
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. is releasing its financial calendar for the year 2013 in the attached file.

item.title: Franjo Bobinac remains in charge of Gorenje for another term
item.description: At today's session, the Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d. d., appointed Mr. Franjo Bobinac as the company President and CEO for the 2013­ – 2018 term and thereby authorised him to propose the other members of the Management Board. The Management Board team for the next term will presumably be confirmed by the Supervisory Board by the end of the year.

item.title: Gorenje wins two CCIS gold awards
item.description: At the tenth Innovation Day held today, the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Slovenia (CCIS) presented awards for the best innovations of last year to enterprises, public-private institutes, and innovators. Two of seven highest, gold, awards went to Gorenje for their Gorenje HomeCHEF oven with innovative colour touch screen and laundry dryer with a heat pump, ranked in the A energy class.

item.title: Gorenje receives award for exemplary corporate governance of a multinational corporation
item.description: On Friday, September 21, Gorenje received at the international investor conference Investo Expo in Ljubljana the award for exemplary corporate governance of a multinational company.

item.title: Gorenje makes a successful appearance at Berlin's IFA tradeshow
item.description: At the world's largest international consumer electronics and home appliance tradeshow IFA in Berlin, taking place from August 31 to September 5 this year, Gorenje canvassed 8% more orders for the German market as in the year before.

item.title: Gorenje at the IFA 2012 marketplace
item.description: Following a notable appearance in previous years, Gorenje challenges the global streams of innovative design and tecnologies at the IFA fair in Berlin again this year. Honouring the motto "Innovation for Healthy Living", the spotlight is be on the revolutionary IQcook induction hob featuring unique steaming technology.

item.title: Despite a hostile environment, Gorenje generates profit and reduces debt in the first half of the year
item.description: At yesterday's session, Gorenje Supervisory Board was presented the business report of the Gorenje Group and its parent company for the first half of this year. Gorenje's operations in Europe were pressured by the aggravation of the debt crisis and dwindling consumer confidence.

item.title: Notice of resignation of a Supervisory Board member
item.description: On August 23, 2012, Management Board and Supervisory Board of Gorenje, d.d., received Mr. Peter Kraljič's irrevocable statement of resignation from the position of Supervisory Board member, as of August 23, 2012, for personal reasons.

item.title: SILENT PERIOD: 9 August 2012 - 24 August 2012
item.description: Gorenje, d.d. has a silent period of 15 days before each quarterly financial report announcement. During the silent period the company will not arrange meetings with investors, analysts, or the media.

item.title: Gorenje appliances again at the pinnacle of design
item.description: Gorenje SensoCARE washing machine and the Gorenje IQcook sensor-controlled induction hob are among this year's products with the best design in the world. Such was the decision of the 30-member jury of the renowned international red dot design contest.

item.title: Announcement of the correction of voting results under agenda items 3.1 and 3.2. at the 18th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Gorenje, d.d., held on Thursday, July 5, 2012
item.description: Due to technical problems during the vote on the resolution for agenda items 3.1 and 3.2 at the 18th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Gorenje, d.d., held on Thursday, July 5, 2012, presided over by Leonard F. Peklar and the Verification Committee comprising Mr. Blaž Klinar, Mr. Robert Ernestl, and Mrs. Milena Obu, in the presence of Notary Public Mrs. Katja Fink from Celje, the Management of the Company announcements the correction of the voting results, as follows:

item.title: Asko manufacturing operations to be shifted from Sweden to Slovenia next year
item.description: Board of Directors of Asko, a Gorenje subsidiary, adopted the decision today to shift the entire Asko manufacturing operations from the plant in Vara, Sweden, to Gorenje facilities in Velenje, Slovenia. The shift will be completed in the course of next year. Asko research and development, brand management, and marketing departments will remain in Vara.

item.title: Resolutions passed at the 18th Annual General Meeting of Gorenje, d.d.
item.description: The Management Board of Gorenje, d.d., hereby announces the resolutions passed at the 18th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Gorenje, d.d.

item.title: SID banka in support of Gorenje's R&D projects
item.description: Gorenje President and CEO Mr. Franjo Bobinac, and Management Board President at SID banka Mr. Sibil Svilan signed an agreement, by which the SID banka grants to Gorenje a 10-year long-term loan to finance four development projects, amounting to a total of EUR 28 million.

item.title: Zlato priznanje za Gorenjeve inovatorje
item.description: Gospodarska zbornica Slovenije (GZS) je danes že dvanajstič podelila nacionalna priznanja za najbolj inovativna podjetja in inovatorje v podjetjih in javno raziskovalnih zavodih. Gorenjevi inovatorji so za novo generacijo samostojnih hladilno-zamrzovalnih aparatov širine 600 mm prejeli zlato priznanje.

item.title: Gorenje v Berlinu premierno predstavlja osebne kuharske pomočnike HomeMade
